inputs.name: features
inputs.label: Feature(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root of the feature file(s) to publish. Wildcards can be used. For example, `**\*.feature` for all feature files in all sub folders.

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Augurk Instance
inputs.helpMarkDown: Augurk instance to which the features should be published.

inputs.name: branchName
inputs.label: Branch Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the branch under which the features should be published to Augurk.

inputs.name: groupName
inputs.label: Group Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the group under which the features should be published to Augurk.

inputs.name: clearGroup
inputs.label: Clear Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether the group should be cleared of existing features when new features are published.

inputs.name: language
inputs.label: Language
inputs.helpMarkDown: Language in which the feature files have been written. For example: `en-US` or `nl-NL`.
